fullplot: A series of interwoven story lines brings to light how the proliferation of guns in America dramatically influence and shape every day lives. A gun shop owner, an ace student, a single mother, and a school principal are among those profoundly affected.
plot: Seemingly disparate portraits of people -- among them a single mother, a high school principal, and an ace student -- Distinctly American -- all affected by the proliferation of guns in American society.
title: American Gun

tomatoes.consensus: Despite its intriguing premise, this earnest anti-gun polemic is too melodramatic to resonate.
